Package io.atomix.catalyst.buffer.util

Provides interfaces for performing low-level on- and off-heap memory management.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Memory
    Memory allocator.
    MemoryAllocator<T extends Memory>
    Memory allocator.

    Java heap memory allocator.

Package io.atomix.catalyst.buffer.util Description

Provides interfaces for performing low-level on- and off-heap memory management.
